Description.Text: Royalton is centrally located in the heart of midtown Manhattan, steps from Fifth Avenue shopping, the Broadway Theater District, Times Square, nightlife, and convenient to the downtown shopping and the Wall Street business district. The groundbreaking Royalton introduced the world to the concepts of “Hotel as Theatre” and the “Art of Lobby Socializing” – thereby revolutionizing the hotel industry. Royalton's uniquely beautiful Lobby, with its stage-set elegance that runs an entire city block, instantly became the place to see and be seen in New York.

• The International Center of Photography - 1.5 blocks • Bryant Park (NY Public Library) - 2.5 blocks • Garment District - 2.5 blocks • Grand Central Terminal - 2.5 blocks • Times Square - 3.5 blocks • Rockefeller Center - 4 blocks • Radio City Music Hall - 5 blocks • St. Patrick's Cathedral - 7 blocks

• 16-story Royalton offers 205 guestrooms. • For the special functions are the hotel's acclaimed Lobby, Library Table, 3 Penthouses, Round Bar and “44” restaurant. • Royalton's gym is a well-appointed 24-hour facility featuring state-of-the-art fitness equipment. • A well-appointed Executive Boardroom with state-of-the-art audio-visual and telecommunications equipment, portable computers, mobile phones and fax machines available upon request.

• 16-story Royalton offers 205 guestrooms. • For the special functions are the hotel's acclaimed Lobby, Library Table, 3 Penthouses, Round Bar and “44” restaurant. • Royalton's gym is a well-appointed 24-hour facility featuring state-of-the-art fitness equipment. • A well-appointed Executive Boardroom with state-of-the-art audio-visual and telecommunications equipment, portable computers, mobile phones and fax machines available upon request.

• Golf / Tennis • Ice skating • Swimming • Rowing or canoeing • Racquetball/squash • Running track/path • Aerobics/ Yoga classes • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing
• Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

LaGuardia Airport (LGA):(8 miles) Driving directions from LaGuardia Airport: From the airport exit, take Grand Central Pkwy. W. to the Triboro Bridge (toll), cross over the bridge, and take FDR Dr. S. to the 49th St. exit. Proceed on 49th St., turn left (downtown) on Seventh Ave., and turn left on 44th St. The hotel is on the right, between Fifth and Sixth avenues.

• 44 Restaurant: The critically acclaimed '44' restaurant serves innovative American cuisine. • Round Bar: Intimate, circular, 20-person lounge inspired by writer Ernest Hemingway's favorite bar at Hôtel Ritz in Paris.Open for cocktails early evening to late night.
